name: CreateConfluentAccount
description:
Create a Confluent account on Datadog.

Use this tool to create a new Confluent account within the Datadog platform. Ideal for setting up new Confluent integrations.

parameters.name: confluent_payload
parameters.description: JSON payload containing attributes for the Confluent account such as API key, API secret, and resources.

api_key.description: The API key associated with your Confluent account.

api_secret.description: The API secret associated with your Confluent account.

enable_custom_metrics.description: Enable the `custom.consumer_lag_offset` metric, which contains extra metric tags.

id.description: The ID associated with a Confluent resource.

resource_type.description: The resource type of the Resource. Can be `kafka`, `connector`, `ksql`, or `schema_registry`.

tags.description: A list of strings representing tags. Can be a single key, or key-value pairs separated by a colon.

resources.description: A list of Confluent resources associated with the Confluent account.

tags.description: A list of strings representing tags. Can be a single key, or key-value pairs separated by a colon.

attributes.description: Attributes associated with the account creation request.

type.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `confluent-cloud-accounts`.

data.description: The data body for adding a Confluent account.
